  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>853</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sounds in Poetry Quiz</string>
            <string language="es">Cuestionario sobre la musicalidad de la poesía</string>
            <string language="ga">Fuaimeanna i bhFilíocht – Tráth na gCeist</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Töne im Poesie-Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bruits dans le jeu de poésie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sons no quiz da poesia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Suoni nel quiz di poesia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ήχοι στο διαγωνισμό γνώσεων ποίησης</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">To understand and recognise sound techniques in poetry.</string>
            <string language="es">Para comprender y reconocer técnicas de la musicalidad en la poesía.</string>
            <string language="ga">Teicnící fuaime i bhfilíocht a thuiscint agus a shainaithint.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stichhaltige Techniken in der Poesie verstehen 
und erkennen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pour comprendre et identifier des techniques 
saines dans la poésie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Para compreender e reconhecer técnicas sadias na
poesia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per capire e riconoscere le tecniche sane nella 
poesia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Για να καταλάβει και να αναγνωρίσουν τις υγιείς 
τεχνικές στην ποίηση.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
